Static Public Member Functions

static int alignment ()
 

Detailed Description

This class represents a memory mapped file. It is based on boost::iostreams::mapped_file.

Definition at line 626 of file FileSystem.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum llvm::sys::fs::mapped_file_region::mapmode
Enumerator
readonly 

May only access map via const_data as read only.

readwrite 

May access map via data and modify it. Written to path.

priv 

May modify via data, but changes are lost on destruction.

Definition at line 632 of file FileSystem.h.
